search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for ActiveCampaign (activecampaign.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for ActiveCampaign can be found at: [https://www.activecampaign.com/pricing](https://www.activecampaign.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

extracted_content.content:

Can’t find the answer you’re looking for?
-----------------------------------------

Our Sales team is standing by to help. Get in touch and we’ll be happy to assist you.

[Request a demo](https://www.activecampaign.com/enterprise/demo/)

Free services to help every growing business
--------------------------------------------

No matter what plan you choose, our services are designed to help you get the most out of your investment — so you can focus on running your business.

[Learn all about ActiveCampaign services](https://www.activecampaign.com/onboarding-services)

*   ActiveTraining
    
*   Video tutorials
    
*   Contact migration
    
*   Chat and ticket support
    
*   Customer enablement workshops
    
*   Knowledge base & help guides
    

12,500+ positive customer reviews and counting
----------------------------------------------

We’re the most positively-reviewed marketing automation platform in the world.

[](https://www.g2.com/)

4.5 rating out of 5 stars

13,500+ reviews

Enhanced CRM
------------

Take our built-in CRM to the next level with two powerful add-ons: pipelines and sales engagement.

Pipelines adds advanced pipeline management, deal records, and lead scoring to help you track, manage, and build customer relationships.

Sales engagement gives you everything you need to convert with 1:1 email capabilities, alongside powerful AI analysis and win probability tools to put your sales team one step ahead.

![Image 4](https://active-campaign.transforms.svdcdn.com/production/general/Pricing_split-media.png?w=1600&h=1600&q=80&auto=format&fit=crop&crop=focalpoint&fp-x=0.5&fp-y=0.5&dm=1717212835&s=c04b1db7524d94cf65f308087a63690b)

Frequently asked questions
--------------------------

Discover answers to some of the most-asked questions about our platform.

![Image 6](https://active-campaign.transforms.svdcdn.com/production/general/Pricing_Split-accordion_2024-06-01-033450_bgoi.png?w=1600&h=1600&q=80&auto=format&fit=crop&crop=focalpoint&fp-x=0.5&fp-y=0.5&dm=1717212890&s=05333162ccfc5f0bc3af0a72a4a855b2)

*   ### What is a contact?
    
    A contact is a person or company saved in your account with an email address, phone number, or other identifying information.  
      
    When we calculate your contact limit, we only count active contacts—those subscribed to at least one list. Each active contact is counted once, no matter how many lists they’re on.  
      
    Unconfirmed and bounced contacts do not count toward your limit and cannot receive campaign emails. Unsubscribed contacts only count if they remain subscribed to at least one list.
    
*   ### Do you restrict features with a free trial?
    
    While trials are more limited than paid accounts, you will be able to try most of our features.
    
*   ### Do you have a setup cost?
    
    Absolutely not. You can take on a monthly plan with no contracts, no setup fees, and no hidden gimmicks. Cancel anytime on our month-to-month plans.
    
*   ### Anything special for non-profits?
    
    Yes! We offer a 20% discount for non-profits. Simply contact us with proof of non-profit status.
    

![Image 8](https://active-campaign.transforms.svdcdn.com/production/general/Pricing_Split-accordion_2024-06-01-033450_bgoi.png?w=1600&h=1600&q=80&auto=format&fit=crop&crop=focalpoint&fp-x=0.5&fp-y=0.5&dm=1717212890&s=05333162ccfc5f0bc3af0a72a4a855b2)

We - and our partners - use cookies to deliver our services and to show you ads.

By using our website, you agree to the use of cookies as described in our[Cookie Policy (in English)](https://www.activecampaign.com/legal/cookie-policy)

Accept

![Image 42: Company Logo](https://cdn.cookielaw.org/logos/static/ot_company_logo.png)

Privacy Preference Center
-------------------------

When you visit any website, it may store or retrieve information on your browser, mostly in the form of cookies. This information might be about you, your preferences or your device and is mostly used to make the site work as you expect it to. The information does not usually directly identify you, but it can give you a more personalized web experience. Because we respect your right to privacy, you can choose not to allow some types of cookies. Click on the different category headings to find out more and change our default settings. However, blocking some types of cookies may impact your experience of the site and the services we are able to offer.  
[More information](https://cookiepedia.co.uk/giving-consent-to-cookies)

Allow All

### Manage Consent Preferences

#### Performance Cookies

 Performance Cookies

These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us to know which pages are the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site.    All information these cookies collect is aggregated and therefore anonymous. If you do not allow these cookies we will not know when you have visited our site, and will not be able to monitor its performance.

#### Functional Cookies

 Functional Cookies

These cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and personalisation. They may be set by us or by third party providers whose services we have added to our pages.    If you do not allow these cookies then some or all of these services may not function properly.

#### Strictly Necessary Cookies

Always Active

These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms.    You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the site will not then work. These cookies do not store any personally identifiable information.

#### Targeting Cookies

 Targeting Cookies

These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners. They may be used by those companies to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant adverts on other sites.    They do not store directly personal information, but are based on uniquely identifying your browser and internet device. If you do not allow these cookies, you will experience less targeted advertising.

#### Other

 Other

Additional first-party and/or third-party cookies.
